name: Atomorf2
description:
Atomorf2 is a story about a robot, he lives in a radioactive world.
Levels are silos with many dangerous moving obstacles. Atomorf loves radiation and collects plutonium, but is afraid of sharp objects.

Features:
  • Rotation of the entire level.
  • Plutonium collection.
  • Convenient management.
  • Progress.
  • References to the periodic table!
 
Differences from the first part of the Atomorf game:
  • No weapons.
  • Levels are bigger and harder.
